content: Cheta m onyenwem, achupula nwao dibo Gi
Cheta m onyenwem, Chukwu Nna m o.
Cheta m Onyenwem, chetanu onye I jiri maka ya taa ahuhu,
Cheta m ekwela ka m laa n'iyi.
Cheta m Onyenwem, amara Gi ura kee Gi agbun ihi m,
Cheta m Onyenwem, onye I huru n'anya.
Lee obe Kalvary ebe akpogburu Dinwenu o,
Cheta ebere Gi, Chukwu Nna m o.
